lead_paragraph: The affiliate, which calls itself Sinai Province, said that it carried out an attack on military checkpoints in North Sinai that killed five members of the government’s forces.

headline.main: Egyptian Affiliate of Islamic State Claims Attack on Checkpoints
headline.print_headline: Egyptian Affiliate of Islamic State Claims Attack on Checkpoints
